children.name: Zainab bint Muhammad
children.notes: Married Abu al-As ibn al-Rabi. She had two children, Ali and Umamah.

children.name: Ruqayyah bint Muhammad
children.notes: Married Uthman ibn Affan. She had one son, Abdullah, who also died young.

children.name: Umm Kulthum bint Muhammad
children.notes: Also married Uthman ibn Affan after the death of her sister Ruqayyah.

children.name: Fatimah bint Muhammad
children.notes: Married Ali ibn Abi Talib. She had five children: Hasan, Husayn, Muhsin (died in infancy), Zaynab, and Umm Kulthum.

children.name: Ibrahim ibn Muhammad
children.notes: Mother was Maria al-Qibtiyya. Died in infancy.
